entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as the team Ron helped win the Quidditch Cup.

entities.description: The Quidditch Cup is mentioned as the trophy Gryffindor won.

entities.name: ron weasley

entities.name: harry potter

entities.name: hermione granger

entities.name: grawp
entities.description: Grawp is mentioned as someone that Harry and Hermione wanted to talk about but didn't want to bring Ron back to reality.

entities.name: beech tree
entities.description: The beech tree on the edge of the lake is mentioned as a place where they could study without being overheard.

entities.name: lake
entities.description: The lake is mentioned as being near the beech tree.

relationships.description: Ron Weasley is a member of Gryffindor, which won the Quidditch Cup.
Harry Potter wanted to talk about Grawp but didn't want to bring Ron back to reality.
Hermione Granger also wanted to talk about Grawp but didn't want to bring Ron back to reality.
Ron Weasley studied at the beech tree on the edge of the lake.
Harry Potter also studied at the beech tree on the edge of the lake.
